CustomField.formula: IF( ( TEXT (Form1_Status_Type__c) = "Canceled by Division" || TEXT (Form1_Status_Type__c) = "Canceled by HR" || TEXT (Form1_Status_Type__c) = "Request to Hire Submitted" || TEXT (Form1_Status_Type__c) = "Release of Applications" || TEXT (Form1_Status_Type__c) = "Interviews - Conducted" || TEXT (Form1_Status_Type__c) = "Packet to HR - Part 1 Received" || TEXT (Form1_Status_Type__c) = "Packet to HR - Part 1 Under Review" || TEXT (Form1_Status_Type__c) = "Packet to HR - Part 2 Received" || TEXT (Form1_Status_Type__c) = "Packet to HR - Part 2 Under Review" || TEXT (Form1_Status_Type__c) = "HR Final Packet - Analyst Approved" || TEXT (Form1_Status_Type__c) = "HR Final Packet - Manager Approved" || TEXT (Form1_Status_Type__c) = "HR Final Packet - Submitted to CalHR" || TEXT (Form1_Status_Type__c) = "CalHR - Approved" || TEXT (Form1_Status_Type__c) = "CalHR - Denied" || TEXT (Form1_Status_Type__c) = "HR - Job Offer Clearance Notification") , "Tracked" , ( IF ( CONTAINS( TEXT(Form1_Status_Type__c), "Hold") , "Hold-Tracked" , "") ) )
CustomField.label: Record Status Type
